content: Filippo, your observations are sharp as a mariner's eye. Indeed, securing my cottage is about laying a stable keel in these Venetian waters, especially with the BasstheWhale matter still unsettled. I agree, our shared Forestieri position demands we look to each other. I'm keen to hear more about these independent trade networks and any insights on reliable suppliers. Avoiding the nobles' entanglements is a wisdom I've learned at sea â€“ best to chart our own course. What specific routes or goods do you see as most promising for us?
